sentences.en: But following the ruckus over the AEP, several states are tinkering with the course material.
sentences.cn: 但是随着AEP引发诸多争议, 数个邦都在对教材乱改一气.

sentences.en: He's making a ruckus, and all the neighbors are mad!
sentences.cn: 他在制造噪音, 邻居们都愤怒了!

sentences.en: I like the shit you did with Rawkus too , that shit was fat.
sentences.cn: 我也喜欢你和Ruckus的歌, 那很棒.

sentences.en: I like the shit you did with Ruckus too , that shit was fat.
sentences.cn: I高特额乳母复额舞要剖死特儿子俺要赔车子, 慢.

sentences.en: I requested them to stop making such a ruckus.
sentences.cn: 我请求他们不要再这样吵闹.

sentences.en: Music downloaded from the Ruckus server can only be Ruckus player.
sentences.cn: 在Ruckus服务器上下载的音乐只能够用Ruckus的 播放器来播放.

sentences.en: The boss kicked up quite a ruckus when I came in late.
sentences.cn: 我迟到了,老板把我臭骂了一顿.

sentences.en: The children are creating quite a ruckus.
The ruckus left at least 69 people injured and turned Prague into a smoky battle zone.
sentences.cn: 这场骚动造成了至少六十九人受伤,布拉格也因此成了烟雾弥漫的战场.

sentences.en: This caused such a ruckus all over Japan that they had to change their mind.
sentences.cn: 这在日本上下引起了不小的骚动，他们不得不因此改变主意。

sentences.en: We are not gonna have any ruckus here.
sentences.cn: 我们这不允许有喧闹,也就是说,禁止大声喧哗.

sentences.en: Ya think we could take a break after that victorious ruckus?
sentences.cn: 教练,我们都打赢了.你看,咱们能不能休息一下?

sentences.en: You know how TV loves a ruckus.

trans.tran_en: a noisy argument or confused situation
